! exec cue vet null.yaml schema.cue
cmp stderr null-stderr

! exec cue vet nonull.yaml schema.cue
cmp stderr nonull-stderr
-- schema.cue --
a:b:c: string
-- null.yaml --
a: null
-- nonull.yaml --
a:
-- null-stderr --
a: conflicting values null and {b:{c:string}} (mismatched types null and struct):
    ./null.yaml:1:5
    ./schema.cue:1:3
-- nonull-stderr --
a: conflicting values null and {b:{c:string}} (mismatched types null and struct):
    ./nonull.yaml:1:2
    ./schema.cue:1:3
